item.description:
Dear Ladies & Gents,

Start your holiday shopping without facing the mall crowds!  Come to the Vendor Shopping Event on Friday, November 2, from 7 to 9 p.m. at Social Fun member Joan's house in Danvers.  (Thank you, Joan!)  So far we have representatives from Mary Kay Cosmetics, Stella & Dot jewelry, Thirty-One Gifts, Pampered Chef, Scentsy Candles, and Salon Sage Hair Care and Style Consultants.

Participating Consultants:

  • Tammy Ross, Mary Kay Cosmetics: http://www.marykay/rosst
  • Karen Kilrain Bast, Stella & Dot: http://www.stelladot.com/sites/karenbast
  • Michele Widomski, Thirty-One: http://www.mythirtyone.com/michelewidomski
  • Janice Mancini, Pampered Chef: janicemancini@verizon.net
  • Marion Spicer, Scentsy Candles: marionspicer1@gmail.com
  • Nicole Murphy, Salon Sage Hair Care and Style Consultants:  http://salonsageofsalem.com
  • Chelsea Pells, Tastefully Simple: tswithcmp@gmail.com

Enjoy wine, beer, and light refreshments while shopping and socializing with friends.  Feel free to bring guests. You may even win a raffle for free products or the hostess benefits!

Directions to follow.  Hope you can make it!
item.name: Vendor Shopping Event
